attributes.action: to stop forcing the green issue when Alistair Darling is filmed getting out of an uneconomical Land Rover Discovery on the first day of the Copenhagen Conference.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am tired of listening to Labour talking of green credentials when the opposite is true. Alistair Darling was seen walking away from a Land Rover Discovery on the first day of the Copenhagen Conference. I understand that a Discovery is manufactured in Britain, but so are more economical cars such as a Nissan Qashqai and Toyota Avensis. Enough of the lipservice, I want to see action.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
